places.name: Eiffel Rive Gauche
places.description: The Eiffel Rive gauche hotel welcomes you in one of the most prestigious districts of Paris, at the heart of the triangle Eiffel Tower, Invalids, Champs-Elysees ... Near the Trocadero, near the Champs de Mars, the Arc of Triumph, of Concorde, of the museum of the Quai Branly, Unesco ... Tourism, shopping, affairs, entertainment ... You will be just a few steps away from the high places of the heritage, the most beautiful places of interest, the shops selling luxury goods, the theaters, and the business area. In a quiet street of this restless left riverside, nested in a former convent, our hotel is an island of peace in the cosy and elegant atmosphere. Let charm by his sober and sophisticated atypical frame, its unique atmosphere, take time to stroll in our patio ... And savor the pleasure to relax you in this harbor of peace in the middle of the city lights.

placeDetails.name: Hotel du Champ de Mars
placeDetails.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Paris, Hotel du Champ de Mars is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Hotel du Champ de Mars makes it easy to enjoy the best of Paris.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel du Champ de Mars features a 24 hour front desk and a concierge. In addition, as a valued Hotel du Champ de Mars guest, you can enjoy breakfast that is available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, Hotel du Champ de Mars is located a short distance from Arc de Triomphe (1.3 mi) and Louvre Museum (1.4 mi).
While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the steakhouses, including Le Relais de l'Entrecote, Il Etait Un Square, and La Poule au Pot, all of which are a short distance from Hotel du Champ de Mars.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Eiffel Tower (0.5 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), or Champs-Elysees (0.9 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hotel du Champ de Mars is sure to make your visit to Paris one worth remembering.

address_obj.address_string: 7 rue du Champ de Mars, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel Relais Bosquet By Malone
placeDetails.description: Découvrez pourquoi l'Hotel Relais Bosquet est l'hôtel préféré des voyageurs visitant Paris. Mélange idéal entre rapport qualité/prix et confort, il offre un cadre romantique avec une gamme de services conçus pour les voyageurs comme vous. Le Relais Bosquet est un hôtel romantique proposant des chambres équipées d'une télévision à écran plat, d'une climatisation et d'un minibar. Vous pouvez également compter sur un wi-fi gratuit pour rester connecté tout au long de votre séjour. L'hôtel dispose d'une réception ouverte 24 heures sur 24, d'une conciergerie. Le petit déjeuner n'est pas étranger à sa grande popularité auprès des voyageurs visitant Paris. Situé à proximité des monuments les plus célèbres de Paris, comme Arc de Triomphe (2,1 km) et Musée du Louvre (2,3 km), l'Hotel Relais Bosquet est une destination idéale pour les touristes. Nous sommes sûrs que vous apprécierez votre séjour à l'Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris et que vous pourrez profiter de tout ce que Paris a à offrir.

address_obj.address_string: 19 rue du Champ de Mars, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel Eiffel Kensington
placeDetails.description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Eiffel Kensington, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as The Catacombs of Paris (2.1 mi) and Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Paris (2.2 mi), guests of Hotel Eiffel Kensington can easily experience some of Paris' most well known attractions.
Rooms at Hotel Eiffel Kensington offer a flat screen TV providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk and baggage storage are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A snack bar will also help to make your stay even more special.
If you’re looking for a Chinese restaurant, consider a visit to Buddha-Bar, Ducky's, or Shang Palace, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Hotel Eiffel Kensington.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular museums such as Louvre Museum.
Hotel Eiffel Kensington looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Paris.

address_obj.address_string: 79 avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel de l'Alma
placeDetails.description: Vous cherchez un hôtel calme à Paris ? Bienvenue à l'Hotel de l'Alma by Malone, un établissement de choix pour les voyageurs comme vous. L'Hotel de l'Alma vous propose une foule de commodités, dont une télévision à écran plat, un minibar et un bureau. Il est également possible de rester connecté via un wi-fi gratuit. L'hôtel dispose d'une réception ouverte 24 heures sur 24, d'un enregistrement / départ express et d'un mobilier d'extérieur pour rendre votre séjour encore plus plaisant. L'établissement propose également un buffet petit déjeuner. Situé à proximité des monuments les plus célèbres de Paris, comme Musée du Louvre (2,4 km) et Les Catacombes De Paris (3,3 km), L'alma Hotel est une destination idéale pour les touristes. L'Hotel de l'Alma vous offre le meilleur de Paris à votre portée, pour un séjour parfait en tous points.

address_obj.address_string: 32 rue de l Exposition, 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel de la Paix Tour Eiffel
placeDetails.description: WELCOME TO THE HÔTEL DE LA PAIX TOUR EIFFEL The Hotel de la Paix Tour Eiffel welcomes you at the foot of the Eiffel Tower, in the 7th arrondissement of Paris. You will discover in a few steps the cultural wealth of Paris: The Trocadero, the Invalides, the Champs Elysees. Our fully refurbished three-star hotel, with a sober and contemporary design, with a warm and calm atmosphere, is a haven for both business and leisure travelers. Our inviting reception has a lounge with a comfortable sofa and armchairs, a library corner with a coffee and tea machine.

address_obj.address_string: 19 rue du Gros Caillou 07 Arr., 75007 Paris France

placeDetails.name: Hotel du Cadran
placeDetails.description: Set half way between the Eiffel Tower and the Invalides Museum in a charming pedestrian street, the Hotel du Cadran, recently renovated on 2018, is superbly located for exploring numerous tourist attractions, including the Champs Elysees, the Alma Bridge, or the superb Rodin Museum. The UNESCO building is only a 5-minute walk away. There are Metro stations near the hotel, including Ecole Militaire and the area offers a warm Parisian atmosphere. Explore the charming Rue Cler and its quality food shops, enjoy a drink, a coffee or a meal at one of numerous cafes and restaurants around our hotel and watch the world go by.

address_obj.address_string: 10, Rue du Champs de Mars, 75007 Paris France

amenities: Free Wifi in the Business Center

placeDetails.name: Cler Hotel
placeDetails.description: Le Cler Hotel est un hotel de 26 chambres, il se situe dans une très belle rue pietonne, à quelques pas seulement de la Tour Eiffel et des Invalides. A la fois delicieusement classique et resolument contemporaine, cette adresse accueillante de la rive gauche fait la part-belle au design sans renoncer a la simplicite.
